alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:40PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 115 PM CDT... At 1240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near University Heights, or near Iowa City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... University Heights around 1250 PM CDT. Iowa City, Coralville, Tiffin and Oakdale around 100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include North Liberty. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 235 and 250. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
